name: FORTITUDE (scratcher_bleh)
description:
No longer being updated. Also, there's no reason to put your save codes in the comments. Other players literally cannot load them.

As this has seen a lot of traffic recently, I applied a bug fix to the online side of the leaderboards :)

---

Welcome to Fortitude!

Shoot [Left Click]

Pick Up [Mouse+E]

Drop [Q]

Jump [SPACE or W]

Move [A/D]
